cmd_init_bash_profile:
rm .bash_profile
echo -e JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_15 >> .bash_profile
echo -e 'PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin' >> .bash_profile
echo -e export JAVA_HOME PATH >> .bash_profile
echo -e export BOOTH_ID=!@#$ >> .bash_profile
echo -e alias ll=\'ls -all\' >> .bash_profile
echo -e "export SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=real" >> .bash_profile
cat .bash_profile
